Solanaâ€™s destiny is realized when 1B+ key pairs are also one billion asset owners. DePIN makes this possible, and more things soon will â€” changing the relationship between labour and capital as we know it today.

There are 3 main reasons why market inefficiencies remain uncorrected:

1. High risk
2. High cost of capital
3. High activation energy

Opportunities arise if you believe these factors are overestimated or if youâ€™re willing to work harder than the competition.
If a VC ever threatens you to spin up a competitor against you if you don't want their money, then you REALLY don't want their money.

first time I've seen this scam, so posting it as a heads up for users and interfaces

someone bought the ens "[myEthereumAddress].eth"

so when you paste in my address, the top result in some UIs is an ens match instead of the resolved ENS name

impt for UIs to filter these out https://t.co/0cQAL5tQ0T

There's a heated debate if programs (smart contracts) on @solana should be immutable.

But there's no debate that if you use upgradable contracts you should implement a multisig for the upgrade authority.

It's easy, use @SquadsProtocol.

The solution is digital ownership + provenance + crypto payments

I turned 45 this past week, and I felt I had to share a mid-life reflection:

We should all hope to live long enough to achieve a state of mental peace and clarity so that when we look back on our lives, we do not wish that we achieved more but instead that we gave more.
